response.overview: A woman is captured by the world of convention. Blindfolded, she is unaware of her fate. On realising her predicament, she takes control and escapes from the life that was thrust upon her. She instead embraces the life of her choosing - her destiny. This film works off the traditional theme of silent films - the heroine in distress. But this heroine was totally unaware of her predicament.
response.title: Tango in the River
